TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_aam, title = aam, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/aam} }

S.FORM: == aam == u kamu nu Hulam aam 稀飯 aamen 去乞討 miaam 討飯 miaamay 乞丐 misaaam 煮稀飯 sapisaaam 煮稀飯用的器具 sasaaamen 煮稀飯的食材 u zumazuma nu tinaku a kamu aam u aam ku sakalanam tu sananal. caykabecul mukan tu aam. caykatenes mangalaytu. aamen aamen nu miaamay ku tubah ni Bunga! miaam miaam ku miaamay tu hemay. miaamay katuud ku miaamay i Taypak. misaaam misaaam kaku tu sakalanam nu niyam. sapisaaam sapisaaam kina dangah. sasaaamen kau baduwac nu pabuy ku pacamul tu sasaaamen. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinenganː malaalitin tu i hekalay atu zumaay a natinenganː

== aam == o kamo no Holam aam 稀飯 aamen 去乞討 miaam 討飯 miaamay 乞丐 misaaam 煮稀飯 sapisaaam 煮稀飯用的器具 sasaaamen 煮稀飯的食材 o zomazoma no tinako a kamo aam o aam ko sakalanam to sananal. caykabecol mokan to aam. caykatenes mangalayto. aamen aamen no miaamay ko tobah ni Bonga! miaam miaam ko miaamay to hemay. miaamay katood ko miaamay i Taypak. misaaam misaaam kako to sakalanam no niyam. sapisaaam sapisaaam kina dangah. sasaaamen kao badowac no paboy ko pacamol to sasaaamen. namakayniay a nasolitan nasakamoan ato natinenganː malaalitin to i hekalay ato zomaay a natinenganː
